dct_title_s: How to get there. Traveller's handbook : Plan of bus and trolley stops, Athens / Igoumenides Publications (Verso)
dct_description_sm: Recto: "How to get there. Traveller's handbook. Plan of bus and trolley stops Athens." Tourist information includes trolley lines and bus lines. Tourist information includes bus schedules and fares, electric train stations. Legend shows highway national roads, main roads, secondary roads. Copyright -- Igoumenides Publications.
